EmailTemplate.name: Cart Abandonment Communication.Cart Abandonment Final Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, you've left something in your cart
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View in browser <[[https://pages1.honeywell.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWVRReVpqVXdOMlE1TnpFNCIsInQiOiJsVTFVVlVlVVF1Mk82ejBJcFRteVFodFZXNzdCSXdETE5ueFhpOVZIV2R3ZW11SGJDb0luY09uK1FkeUQxUVBZcnc5UGFobDY4dzMvZlZlc01PQUp4NlVTQ3c5NEtlWHFMZFFVMW53K1ZaL3pJSUk1ZjhXOFluZ3kzL1N5ZVY2cyJ9]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in our Honeywell Aerospace products! We noticed you left something in your cart—are you done shopping? We thought we'd help out by sending a quick reminder to inform you in case this was not intentional. Please find product details below.
{{my.Cart Communication}}
If you're having trouble checking out, call us at 1-602-365-3099, or for other inquiries, go to our Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> page.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace
VIEW MY CART <[[https://aerospace2.honeywell.com/onlineordering/ordering/loadCartpage]]> © 2019 Honeywell International Inc. <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile or unsubscribe <[[http://na-sjp.marketo.com/lp/549-RAQ-832/2018-GDPR-Website-Implementation_Custom-Unsubscribe-page.html]]>. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.honeywell.com/privacy-statement]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]>
